name: A Punishment to Fit The Crime
name_original: A Punishment to Fit The Crime
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 152

Description: It is a first person view survival game with exploration and platformer elements.

Made by
Adam Z Hajdu: https://www.artstation.com/adamzhajdu
Viktoria Berta: https://www.artstation.com/viktoriaberta
Music and SFX Justino Pérez

Engine: Unreal Engine 4
Platform: PC
Mode: Single-player

Recommended System Requirement

  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4720HQ CPU @ 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8.00GB
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960M
  • Storage: 550 MB

Bugs:
- Exit some times broken, use ctrl+alt+del to close the application.
- In exploration mode the lighting has some issue.
